name: xRM
tagline: Understands the challenges your business is facing
description:
xRM.com is a Microsoft Partner and Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle invitee providing application hosting, software development, and consulting. We are unique in that we offer our customers unparalleled choice and flexibility when it comes to deployment models (on-premise, hosted, or hybrid) and professional services.
From presales to go-live support, from proof of concepts in a hosted model to implementations in an on-premise model, from demonstrations to trainings, we are your single source.
